short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculates GWA for FEU Tech Portal

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A handy tool for FEU Tech students to quickly calculate their General Weighted Average (GWA) for midterms and finals. Just open the FEU Tech course card page, click a button, and instantly see your GWA.
